ingredients: 2 Tbsp Pumpkin Seeds or Sunflower Seeds
(Optional) Fresh Parsley or Cilantro for garnish
steps: Rinse lentils and combine with water and salt in a medium pot
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes until tender. Drain any excess liquid
While lentils cook, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add sliced red cabbage and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until softened
Add garlic, salt, and pepper. Cook for 1 minute
Stir in balsamic vinegar and cook for another 2 minutes. Remove from heat
Assemble bowls with quinoa or rice as the base
Top with cooked lentils, saut√©ed red cabbage, sliced avocado, and a dollop of hummus
Sprinkle with seeds and garnish with fresh herbs
Serve with lemon wedges for squeezing over the top
title: Red Cabbage and Lentil Bowl
